content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Service Request for an employee relocation to another country/city is created in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" after the related Relocation Request is submitted in UPSA (status - in progress).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tasks to the involved services are opened automatically. For details see articles:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-          \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/64adF\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relocation Request from one country to another\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-          \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/eoadF\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Relocation Request within one country from one city to another\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM – Service Desk Analysts perform the actions, required on Service Desk side, in accordance with WI “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc=/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/EPM-HELP_WI_EmployeeRelocationEPAMOfficeAnotherCityCountry.doc&action=default&DefaultItemOpen=1\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Relocation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
